name: Jason Doedoe
text: Great service great knowledgeable owner and mechanic. Always up front and honest. Will continue to use their services.

name: Philip Johnson
text: Ricky is is the best.  The work is done fast and complete.  Also,  let you know if there are other things that might be a problem down the road.

name: John Beebe
text: They have product. They have knowledgeable sales, service and parts people. They are there to help you when you need help.

name: Adam Jennings
text: Took a long time to repair, boat still doesn't run good

name: benthere123
text: Nice selection of new and used top tier boats for sale.  Very helpful staff.

name: adam anderlik
text: Drove in from West Florida and picked up a Consigned boat listed online and then discussed over the phone. Wanted to make sure all was known and agreed upon before I made an eight hour drive.  Boat was cleaner than I had hoped and Daniel was upfront and honest while discussing and negotiating over the phone. Paperwork was all prepared and accurate when I got there, so the close quick and easy. Not a bad thing to say and would not hesitate to work with them again.

name: Katherine Salom
text: We visit the service department at Blue Water Yacht sales quite often as they almost always have what we need to make repairs to our boat. If they don’t have what we need, they can get it for us pretty quickly. We will continue to come here to get whatever we need for our boat!

resp.text: Thanks Katherine.  We appreciate your business!

name: William Babcock
text: Great place

resp.text: Thanks William.  We appreciate your patronage!

name: kitespearo
text: Dealing with Forrest and his whole company was a pleasure. He communicated with us on a very timely manner. The whole deal was very easy and headache free. Even after the purchase of the boat he keeps in touch following up on the sales and experience. I would recommend to my friends and family 100%. if you are ever looking for a boat this is the company you want to deal with even when dealing out of state like we did.

name: Glenn Craft
text: Very good service. I took my 225 Yamaha to them because it would not idle. They repaired it an a couple other things I wanted done in just 1 week the other shop I took it to kept it for 3 weeks an didn’t fix the problem .  Just took out for a test run works like a new one.  I’m very satisfied.

name: kandie watson
text: Ok expensive

name: Dave Packett
text: Great people

name: Paul Kuehn
text: I can’t say enough good about how Brandon took care of me. A couple of buddies and I were traveling back from Daytona Beach to Arkansas when we experienced a tire separation and broken leaf spring on the trailer. Brandon saved our trip by providing outstanding service to get us back on the road safely. He even gave us a great restaurant recommendation since we were all hungry. Thanks again for the prompt customer service.

name: J Irby
text: I highly suggest anyone to shop here. I will not be buying anything trailer related from anyone else. I was very satisfied with the service I received. I would give more stars if I could.

name: Conner Jung
text: Great group that will help you out in anyways and make suggestions on what you should do or don't have to worry about. They aren't there to rip you off. They are there to help and get you back on the water as quick as possible. They have great prices that you can't hardly find anywhere.

name: Daniel Payton
text: This is my new go-to spot for all things trailer related. Best customer service in town hands down.

name: Vaughn Traywick
text: Brandon and his crew did a great job setting up a trailer for my new boat.  They even notified me (and photographed) a few major issues with the actual boat that I will get resolved with the manufacturer.  This is outstanding customer service.

name: Scott Dauenheimer
text: They have everything you need to repair a trailer or buy a new boat trailer at the best price I could find any where within 100 miles.

name: JWDozer
text: Very impatient.  Looking at a boat that was still on the internet... "don't have it bye!"

name: divots dad
text: Brandon and his staff  offer the BEST prices and service in Mobile hands down!

name: Johnathan Schemerhorn
text: Great honest operation here I called 20 trailer places in the entire area only one who called me back and got me a trailer Fast and fair prices

name: Ryan Brightman
text: Brandon was a life saver this weekend.  I had a hub blow out on the side of the road on a Saturday.  Brandon was nice enough to meet me at his shop on a Saturday to sell me a hub to get me going.  Best customer service experience I have had in years.

name: Jason Riemann
text: Best place in Mobile for Quality trailer parts and service, boat sales, and engiine service. 4 tires and wheels installed and engine serviced in a few hours! More fishing time.  Can’t recommend anyone else.

name: Travis Poling
text: Great in every way! Friendly service and GREAT prices and selection. THE place to go for everything boat trailer related.

name: Josh McNickle
text: I purchased a boat from recreational sales and service just over a year ago and was very pleased with service received from Brandon during my purchase. I have and will continue to refer people to recreational sales and service for all boating and trailer needs. Great place!

name: Glen Chaplin
text: Have used several times and always had great service.  Have called ahead to see if they could stay past closing time for me to pick up what I needed!

name: chad palmer
text: We have a multi boat charter business and could not do it without these guys. Fast super friendly and great in stock inventory

name: Thomas Miller
text: Great service. Will definitely go back

name: Ben Nelson
text: Excellent selection of trailer parts in stock

name: Reese Swartz
text: Man, what a bunch of nice guys!  Great transaction!

name: Jon Dreaden
text: If you need trailer parts or service,  this is the only place to go.  Very friendly staff.

name: Robert Rhodes
text: Brandon and his staff always have what we need at great prices & great service.

name: Michael Robinson
text: Best place to get what you need for your trailer

name: riverrat1946@yahoo.com Lunceford
text: Great place to get your boat fixed or tailer parts and repaired

name: Greg Callaghan
text: Brandon is very knowledgeable, I was looking for boat trailer parts

name: Aaron Allen
text: Needed help on the side of the road and not from the area. Brandon was refered to us and had everything to get us going. Thanks

name: Judson Taylor
text: Excellent customer service. Friendly. I got just what I needed no extras.

name: jonathan brown
text: You may have 99 problems a trailer problem shouldn't be on that lost with a place like this. Brandon has got it together, Mobile has needed a place like this for a long time.

name: Shirley Olson
text: Very professional and polite

name: David Rinaldi
text: Done right. Done quick

name: Marc Mott
text: Everything you need for your trailer and more.

name: Butch W.
text: Knoesgable and Friendly

name: Rod Cromer
text: Knowledgeable,  friendly and helpful

name: Hayden Lunceford
text: Nice place to do business.

name: H Pipkins
text: Great service!

name: Brandon Lunceford
text: Was blown away buy the inventory and cheap prices.

name: Marty Brady
text: So this morning we were getting ready to check out of a campground near Cartersville Ga.  We had multiple issues and called Blackhawk.  They were great to deal with over the phone, helped walk me through solutions and tonight we are in Ohio at campground heading on to Michigan home in the morning. Thanks so much for your help and I would highly recommend these guys to anyone.

name: Nathina Greco
text: I see all the reviews are over 2 years ago, please allow me to update you with a current review. I WILL SUPPLY PHOTOS AND AUDIO OF OUR CONVERSATIONS( from when I picked it up) TO PROVE EVERYTHING STATED HERE IS TRUE! I found Trey(the owner) via Facebook, I always do my research. I saw these reviews, and decided to give him a call, it was a week before memorial day weekend. I can provide all call logs, I told him I have an RV that has a lighting issue that I need checked. Considering I am a first time owner he said it may be a simple fix. I said great when may I drop it by? He said he is backed up and it would really help him out a lot if I could bring it by that Tuesday, I told him that sounds great. He asked that I send him my address and the issues via text before hand. I did. I had to work late and had my cousin drop it off. Please see the photos of our texts. I told him a million times DO NOT BUY ANYTHING for the RV I ONLY want a diagnosis. He took a week, and ended up purchasing: -LP for the RV, Checking the outside, HE BROKE the generator and told me that it stopped working. He even said on audio, it was working when you dropped it off. HE broke the battery disconnect again which was working when I dropped it off. When I went to pick it up he kept repeating how he put me in front of other projects and he needs more time. I explained how he told  me to bring it in on that day because he was behind the previous week. He said well ,.... this that...ect Please see the itemized bill of the charges and work he tried to charge me for that I specifically asked him not to do. I have no doubt he is good at working on more commercial projects,but to try and take advantage of  smaller projects is just not good business. I found another company I would recommend to anyone else who is looking for help, If you drive to him he will diagnose for free and walk the entire vehicle with you! It's Deitz Mobile RV. He does have a few different businesses so his response may be slow, but at least he is honest and up front about everything!

name: Charles Michael
text: Trey (owner)  was  100% accurate on his diagnosis  and repair of my 2002 Road Trek 190 P RV. His prices were more than fair and he stands  behind  his word...100%  !  I found a RV repair shop that I"ll be staying with a long time.

name: Corey Ford
text: Trey , the owner of the company does superior service and provides the very best in care for your boat or Rv, highly recommend his company.

name: Phillip Mccall
text: Fantastic experience w my rv repair. Thanks trey

name: Oli-D TV
text: Your not another face in the crowd with Trey/Blackhawk his customer service is top notch and you can tell he really cares about his customers and your boat (or camper). My new go to guy.

name: irv klayman
text: Fast turn around service 2 days very reasonable price rate highly recommend

name: Mitch Kadow
text: First rate trailer supplier. The show room is impeccable. They truly have any and anything you would need to meet your trailering needs. A friendly knowledgeable staff will answer any questions you have. I only wish I had found them a year ago!

name: Bruce Andrews
text:
This is a fantastic place to visit for all of your trailer needs.
The staff is pleasant and very knowledgeable.
This place is not a disappointment!!!
